# Blockquotes

> This is a simple blockquote.

> This is a blockquote
> that spans multiple lines
> in the source.

> This is a blockquote with **bold**, *italic*, and `code` inside.

> First level of quoting.
>
> > Nested blockquote.
>
> Back to the first level.

> > > Triple-nested blockquote.

> ### Blockquote with a heading
>
> - And a list item
> - Another list item
>
> Some paragraph text inside the blockquote.
>
> ```ruby
> puts "Code inside a blockquote"
> ```
